name: Any Form
author: Yigal Hasin

sections.description:
Any Form plugin enables you to collect data from your site visitors and manage it inside your admin dashboard.
The form has very simple configuration which is not requires any programing skils.
Email account is not required.

Docs and support

When you can’t find the answer to your question on the FAQ or in any of the documentation, check the support forum on WordPress.org.
If you can’t locate any topics that pertain to your particular issue, post a new topic for it.

Privacy notices

This plugin does not:

  • send any data to external servers.
  • use cookies.

Translations

You can [translate Any Form] on translate.wordpress.org.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire any-form folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins screen (Plugins > Installed Plugins).

You will find Contacts List menu in your WordPress admin screen.

short_description: Very simple and customisable contact form with database integration and control panel.
